resources.string: Ok, send me your message or use the button below to finish your description
Your description has been saved. You may edit these messages and those editions will be available

You are editing file extension. Current file extension: %s.

Send me any message with one word, it will be used as new extension

Or send me /cancel to cancel current action
Please, send me one word with file extension

You are editing url link. Current url extension: %s.

Send me any message with url, it will be used as new site url

Or send me /cancel to cancel current action
Please, send me one word with url beginning

You are editing maximal size of text. Current maximal size of text: %d.

Available values: %d - %d

Send me any message with the number, it will be used as new maximum

Or send me /cancel to cancel current action

You are editing minimal size of text. Current minimal size of text: %d.

Available values: %d - %d

Send me any message with the number, it will be used as new maximum

Or send me /cancel to cancel current action
You have passed wrong size. It must be number in range from %d to %d
